data.title: Best Chiyaan Vikram movies to stream on Aha Tamil - Dhool, Bheemaa, and more
data.meta_description: Chiyaan Vikram, the National award-winning actor enjoys a massive fan following across the globe. Here are the Best Vikram films you can stream on
data.text:
Vikram, who is widely known in his famous stage name ‘Chiyaan’ Vikram, is undoubtedly one of the finest actors in the Tamil film industry. The National award-winner made a place for himself in the industry, after a very long period of struggle. Now, let’s have a look at the best films of Vikram, inclduing Dhool, Bheema, and others, that you can stream on popular OTT platforms Aha Tamil and OTTplay Premium.

Best Chiyaan Vikram films on Aha Tamil and OTTplay Premium

Dhool

Director: Dharani

Cast: Vikram, Jyotika, Vivek, Reema Sen, Sayaji Shinde, Paravai Muniyamma

This masala action film which is helmed by hitmaker Dharani, revolves around the central character Arumugham, played by Chiyaan Vikram. Dhool narrates the story of Arumugham, a simple villager who travels to Chennai city with his childhood friend-turned-lady love Eswari and his grandmother Mundakanni, to put an end to the villagers’ suffering due to the functioning of a chemical factory. Jyotika played the role of Eswari in the film, which emerged as a major commercial success.

Bheemaa

Director: N Linguswamy

Cast: Vikram, Prakash Raj, Raghuvaram, Trisha Krishnan, Lakshmi Gopalaswamy

This crime action film which is directed by N Linguswamy narrates the story of two powerful criminal gangs in Chennai, headed by Chinna and Periyavar, respectively. When Periyavar’s gang tries to kill Chinna, he is saved by a young man named Sekhar, who joins the gang later and takes up the name Bheemaa. However, things take a different turn after Sekhar falls in love with Shalini, and marries her. Vikram played the role of Sekhar in the movie, while Prakash Raj and Trisha Krishnan appeared as Chinna and Shalini, respectively.

Samurai

Director: Balaji Sakthivel

Cast: Vikram, Anita Hassanandani, Nassar, Jaya Seal

Chiyaan Vikram appeared in the role of Thyagarajan aka Thyagu, a medical student who kidnaps a politician and a police officer named Sandana Pandian, to avenge the death of his classmate Kavitha, who secretly loved him. However, in the process, Sandana realises Thyagu’s kindness, and his daughter Deiva falls in love with him. Anita Hassanandani, the popular Hindi actress played Deiva in the movie, which his directed by Balaji Sakthivel.

Kadhal Sadugudu

Director: VZ Durai

Cast: Vikram, Priyanka Trivedi, Prakash Raj, Vivek

The romantic drama, which is named after a popular song from the Mani Ratnam directorial Alaipayuthey, revolves around the love story of Suresh (Chiyaan Vikram) and Kausalya (Priyanka Trivedi). However, he struggles to get into the good books of his lady love’s father Chidambaram, who is the most important man of the village. The movie, which is helmed by VZ Durai, was a box office failure.
